title: Monero price analysis: XMR recovers $140, can the bulls continue the motion?
description: TL;DR Breakdown The Monero price analysis shows that the XMR price action has found support at the $135.00 mark. Currently, the price action has risen to the $140.00 level and seems to be recovering further.  The broader cryptocurrency market observed a negative market sentiment over the last 24 hours as most major cryptocurrencies recorded negative ... title: Binance announces removal of trading pairs and margin delisting
description: Binance, one of the world’s leading cryptocurrency exchanges, has announced the removal of several spot trading pairs. The affected trading pairs, including BIFI/BUSD, DASH/BNB, FIO/BUSD, DASH/BNB, FIO/BUSD, GAL/BNB, ILV/BNB, KLAY/BNB, LIT/ETH, MC/BNB, MINA/BNB, MLN/BUSD, ONE/ETH, OXT/BUSD, PEOPLE/BNB, PEOPLE/ETH, QNT/BNB, WAXP/BNB, XTZ/ETH, ZEC/BNB, and ZRX/ETH will cease trading on June 14 at specific times.
